20.eng-name: The Book on Vows and Oaths
20.ara-name: كتاب النذور والأيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Umar:"I said:'O Messenger of Allah! I had vowed to perform I'tikaf in Al-Masjid Al-Haram for a night during the era of Jahiliyyah.' He said: 'Fulfill your vow

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وَفَاءِ النَّذْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fulfilling Vows
